Name: Kitten Hero
About the game: Help the kitten rescue his friend and other kittens from a spaceship controlled by an evil artificial intelligence. 80 levels - Play 80 hand-crafted levels filled with deadly traps. Tight controls - Jump over spikes, climb walls and dash to avoid death with ease, optmized controls for gamepads and keyboards! Hardcore difficulty - There's no fighting in Kitten Hero, so you'll have to rely on your speed, reflexes to survive! Deadly traps - There are a lot types of traps ready to prevent you from saving your friend! Cool soundtrack - Your thumbs may hate you, but your ears will love you, lofi 8 bit songs created by Tad! Hats - There are 15 different hats for you to collect and custumize your Hero! A high difficulty precision platform game. Overcome all the challenges created by the A.I. that controls the environment. 15 hats to collect and customize your hero
